CustomField.description: If any active session is greater than 5 hrs, then in violation
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Active_Session_1_Duration__c > 5, Active_Session_2_Duration__c > 5, Active_Session_3_Duration__c > 5 ), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: True if any Active Session is longer than 5 hours.
CustomField.label: Active Session Violation
